coreAttributes.name: ball gag
coreAttributes.description: A leather strap with a rubber ball fixed into one side. When secured into position around the wearer's head, the ball is inserted into their mouth, leaving them unable to speak.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] [npc.her] mouth wide and [npc.verb(slide)] in the ball gag, before reaching back and fastening the buckles to keep it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the ball gag into [npc2.namePos] mouth, before reaching back and fastening the buckles to keep it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the ball gag into [npc2.namePos] mouth, before reaching back and tightly fastening the buckles to keep it in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the ball gag's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it out of [npc.her] mouth.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the ball gag's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it out of [npc2.namePos] mouth.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unfasten)] the ball gag's straps and [npc.verb(yank)] it out of [npc2.namePos] mouth.
